headline.main: BOOKS FOR HOSPITALS IN BRITAIN REQUESTED; Ambulance Corps Hopes to Send Volumes for Christmas

abstract: N Y C Brit-Amer Ambulance Corps plans book drive, N Y C; St Christopher's School, Dobbs Ferry, N Y, benefit to aid injured children in Kent Nursery School
